name: Technology
sentences: Technology is the application of scientific knowledge for practical purposes.
It includes tools, machines, systems, and methods used to solve problems.
Modern technology impacts communication, transportation, healthcare, and more.

name: Artificial Intelligence
sentences: Artificial Intelligence is the simulation of human intelligence in machines.
AI can learn, reason, and make decisions using algorithms and data.
Applications of AI include chatbots, self-driving cars, and medical diagnostics.

name: Climate Change
sentences: Climate change refers to long-term shifts in global or regional climate patterns.
It is largely driven by human activities, especially the burning of fossil fuels.
Impacts include rising temperatures, sea-level rise, and extreme weather events.

name: Renewable Energy
sentences: Renewable energy comes from natural sources that are constantly replenished.
Examples include solar, wind, hydro, geothermal, and biomass energy.
It plays a key role in reducing greenhouse gas emissions.

name: Space Exploration
sentences: Space exploration is the investigation of outer space through astronomy and spacecraft.
It has led to discoveries about planets, stars, and galaxies.
Notable missions include the Apollo Moon landings and Mars rovers.

name: Startups
sentences: A startup is a young company founded to develop a unique product or service.
Startups often focus on innovation and rapid growth.
They usually face high risks but also high potential rewards.

name: Blockchain
sentences: Blockchain is a digital ledger technology for recording transactions securely.
It is decentralized and resistant to tampering.
Blockchain powers cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin and Ethereum.

name: Virtual Reality
sentences: Virtual Reality is a computer-generated simulation of a 3D environment.
Users can interact with it using VR headsets and controllers.
It is used in gaming, training, and education.

name: Mental Health
sentences: Mental health refers to emotional, psychological, and social well-being.
It affects how we think, feel, and behave in daily life.
Good mental health helps us cope with stress and maintain relationships.

name: Nutrition
sentences: Nutrition is the process of providing or obtaining the food necessary for health.
A balanced diet includes carbohydrates, proteins, fats, vitamins, and minerals.
Poor nutrition can lead to diseases and reduced quality of life.

name: Economics
sentences: Economics is the study of production, consumption, and distribution of resources.
It helps explain how individuals, businesses, and governments make decisions.
Economic systems include capitalism, socialism, and mixed economies.

name: History
sentences: History is the study of past events, particularly in human affairs.
It helps us understand cultural, political, and social developments.
Historical knowledge can guide future decisions.

name: Philosophy
sentences: Philosophy is the study of fundamental questions about existence, knowledge, and ethics.
It encourages critical thinking and reasoned argument.
Major branches include metaphysics, epistemology, and ethics.

name: Art
sentences: Art is the expression of human creativity and imagination.
It includes painting, sculpture, music, literature, and more.
Art can inspire, provoke thought, and reflect culture.

name: Music
sentences: Music is the art of arranging sounds in time to produce harmony and melody.
It can evoke emotions and connect people across cultures.
Music genres include classical, jazz, rock, pop, and hip-hop.

name: Sports
sentences: Sports are physical activities involving skill and competition.
They can be played individually or in teams.
Sports promote fitness, teamwork, and discipline.

name: Travel
sentences: Travel is the act of moving from one place to another, often for leisure or work.
It offers opportunities to experience new cultures and environments.
Popular travel types include adventure, cultural, and eco-tourism.

name: Education
sentences: Education is the process of acquiring knowledge, skills, and values.
It can take place in schools, universities, or through self-learning.
Education is a key driver of personal and societal growth.

name: Health & Fitness
sentences: Health and fitness involve maintaining physical and mental well-being.
Regular exercise and a balanced diet contribute to fitness.
Good health improves quality of life and longevity.

name: Entrepreneurship
sentences: Entrepreneurship is the process of starting and running a business.
Entrepreneurs identify opportunities and take risks to innovate.
It plays a vital role in economic growth and job creation.
